algorithm_technique: Breadth-First Search (BFS) to traverse connected components and check completeness
problem_summary_simple: Count connected components where every pair of nodes has an edge.
problem_summary_technical: Uses BFS to find connected components and verifies if each component is a clique by comparing edge counts to expected values.
key_insights: A complete component of size k must have k*(k-1)/2 edges.
BFS is suitable for exploring connected components.
The lookup array prevents re-processing visited nodes.
